channel.title: Nomad
channel.description:
[center]If this is a snippet please point me to the direct board I don't see a snippets section.[/center]
[center][size=24pt]You need 602+ anim/gfx/npc.[/size][/center]
In npc.cfg add:
[code]npc = 8528 Nomad 699 1000[/code]
In npchandler.java find:
[code]public static int getAttackEmote(int i)[/code]
Under one of the cases add:
[code]case 8528: return 12696;[/code]
Now find:
[code]public int getDeadEmote(int i)[/code]
Under one of the cases add:
[code]case 8528: //nomad return 12694;[/code]
Now if anyone has the knowledge of making Nomad aggressive please pm me & tell me how.
